mapper.sql: ID, CHANNEL_CODE, TRANSFER_METHOD, PLAT_TRADE_NO, PAY_ID, CHANNEL_TRADE_NO, PAYER_ACC, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_BANK_TYPE, PAYER_BANK_CODE, PAYEE_ACC, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_BANK_TYPE, PAYEE_BANK_CODE, IS_PUBLIC, IS_SAME_CITY, IS_SAME_BANK, TOTAL_FEE, REMARK, PAYEE_PHONE, TRADE_STATE, ERR_CODE, ERR_DESC, TRADE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select: select b.BANK_NAME as PAYER_BANK_NAME,c.BANK_NAME as PAYEE_BANK_NAME, a.ID,a.CHANNEL_CODE, a.TRANSFER_METHOD, a.PLAT_TRADE_NO, a.PAY_ID, a.CHANNEL_TRADE_NO, a.PAYER_ACC, a.PAYER_NAME, a.PAYER_BANK_TYPE, a.PAYER_BANK_CODE, a.PAYEE_ACC, a.PAYEE_NAME, a.PAYEE_BANK_TYPE, a.PAYEE_BANK_CODE, a.IS_PUBLIC, a.IS_SAME_CITY, a.IS_SAME_BANK, a.TOTAL_FEE, a.REMARK, a.PAYEE_PHONE, a.TRADE_STATE, a.ERR_CODE, a.ERR_DESC, a.TRADE_TIME, a.CREATE_TIME, a.UPDATE_TIME from TB_CHL_TRANSFER_ORDER a , TB_CHL_BANK b , TB_CHL_BANK c where a.PAYER_BANK_TYPE=b.BANK_TYPE and a.PAYEE_BANK_TYPE=c.BANK_TYPE and a.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b.BANK_NAME as PAYER_BANK_NAME,c.BANK_NAME as PAYEE_BANK_NAME, a.ID,a.CHANNEL_CODE, a.TRANSFER_METHOD, a.PLAT_TRADE_NO, a.PAY_ID, a.CHANNEL_TRADE_NO, a.PAYER_ACC, a.PAYER_NAME, a.PAYER_BANK_TYPE, a.PAYER_BANK_CODE, a.PAYEE_ACC, a.PAYEE_NAME, a.PAYEE_BANK_TYPE, a.PAYEE_BANK_CODE, a.IS_PUBLIC, a.IS_SAME_CITY, a.IS_SAME_BANK, a.TOTAL_FEE, a.REMARK, a.PAYEE_PHONE, a.TRADE_STATE, a.ERR_CODE, a.ERR_DESC, a.TRADE_TIME, a.CREATE_TIME, a.UPDATE_TIME from TB_CHL_TRANSFER_ORDER a left join TB_CHL_BANK b on a.PAYER_BANK_TYPE=b.BANK_TYPE left join TB_CHL_BANK c on a.PAYEE_BANK_TYPE=c.BANK_TYPE where 1=1
AND instr(PAY_ID, #{payId}) > 0
AND instr(CHANNEL_TRADE_NO, #{channelTradeNo}) > 0
and TRADE_STATE = #{tradeState,jdbcType=CHAR}
and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME desc,PLAT_TRADE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CHL_TRANSFER_ORDER (ID, CHANNEL_CODE, TRANSFER_METHOD, PLAT_TRADE_NO, PAY_ID, CHANNEL_TRADE_NO, PAYER_ACC, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_BANK_TYPE, PAYER_BANK_CODE, PAYEE_ACC, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_BANK_TYPE, PAYEE_BANK_CODE, IS_PUBLIC, IS_SAME_CITY, IS_SAME_BANK, TOTAL_FEE, REMARK, PAYEE_PHONE, TRADE_STATE, ERR_CODE, ERR_DESC, TRADE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transferMethod,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{platTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{channelTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payerAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payerBankType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payerBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeBankType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payeeBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPublic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSameCity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSameBank,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update TB_CHL_TRANSFER_ORDER
CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
TRANSFER_METHOD = #{transferMethod,jdbcType=CHAR},
PLAT_TRADE_NO = #{platTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_ID = #{payId,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHANNEL_TRADE_NO = #{channelTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYER_ACC = #{payerAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYER_NAME = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYER_BANK_TYPE = #{payerBankType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAYER_BANK_CODE = #{payerBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_ACC = #{payeeAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_NAME = #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_BANK_TYPE = #{payeeBankType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAYEE_BANK_CODE = #{payeeBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_SAME_CITY = #{isSameCity,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_SAME_BANK = #{isSameBank,jdbcType=CHAR},
TOTAL_FEE = #{totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_PHONE = #{payeePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_STATE = #{tradeState,jdbcType=CHAR},
ERR_CODE = #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_DESC = #{errDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_TIME = #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_CHL_TRANSFER_ORDER set CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, TRANSFER_METHOD = #{transferMethod,jdbcType=CHAR}, PLAT_TRADE_NO = #{platTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_ID = #{payId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHANNEL_TRADE_NO = #{channelTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYER_ACC = #{payerAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYER_NAME = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYER_BANK_TYPE = #{payerBankType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAYER_BANK_CODE = #{payerBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE_ACC = #{payeeAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE_NAME = #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE_BANK_TYPE = #{payeeBankType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAYEE_BANK_CODE = #{payeeBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_SAME_CITY = #{isSameCity,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_SAME_BANK = #{isSameBank,jdbcType=CHAR}, TOTAL_FEE = #{totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE_PHONE = #{payeePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_STATE = #{tradeState,jdbcType=CHAR}, ERR_CODE = #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_DESC = #{errDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_TIME = #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
